review: LOVE IT!  It is so easy to use.  Plus, the voice search function does not have a problem with what some might call my "Southern drawl."  My husband uses it to run KODI, so our whole video library is RIGHT THERE.  Between KODI and Prime, I don't know what else I could possibly need, but I look forward to exploring ALL the things Fire TV can do!
